1.210 MCP Server Implementation (fastmcp, mcp-python, patterns)
description: Research best practices for building MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers. Compare fastmcp vs mcp-python, transport options (stdio, SSE, HTTP), multi-tenant patterns, security contexts. MPSE format: S1 library landscape, S2 architecture patterns/benchmarks, S3 generic use case patterns, S4 ecosystem evolution. Deliverable: Generic implementation guide and decision framework. METHODOLOGY: spawn-experiments 1.618 completed - M4 (Mutation TDD) won at 93/100, M1 (Immediate) runner-up at 92/100. fastmcp makes MCP trivial.
